existing_features.title: Build a chat interface with a message list displaying conversation history and a text input area with send button for submitting new messages
Implement message sending functionality that posts user messages to the backend and displays them in the chat interface
Apply a modern, sleek chat application design with a clean layout, contemporary typography, and a professional color scheme distinct from blue and purple

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend actor that stores and retrieves chat messages with fields for message text, timestamp, and sender role (user or assistant)
